questions.question: What is the purpose of version control in software development?
Which programming language is commonly used for web development?
What is the purpose of unit testing in software development?

options.a: To test the entire software system
options.b: To test individual units or components
options.c: To deploy the software to production

questions.question: What is the Agile methodology in software development known for?

options.a: Strict adherence to a fixed plan

questions.question: What is the purpose of a software design pattern?

options.b: To standardize common solutions to recurring problems
options.c: To slow down the development process
